root.name: Mice Profiler Tracker
root.description: Mice Profiler tracks multiple mice from a top view video.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 7.1.0.16 Date 2014-07-08 17:36:27
Updated to fit with new features added in the video label maker.
- Version 7.1.0.15 Date 2014-04-03 18:37:16
- Fix an error in a label
- Version 7.1.0.14 Date 2014-04-03 18:28:26
- World E removed - Add: button to switch identity of tracks from t to the end of the records - Lock scroll ( key e ) - Video name is in the title of the sequence - Seeking moves the initialization ROIs - Model size can now be changed anytime (not before video load) - Head of mouse can be tracked manually using the 1 and 2 keys.
- Version 7.1.0.13 Date 2013-12-05 10:56:19
Dependencies update for Video Label Maker
- Version 7.1.0.12 Date 2013-12-04 15:03:03
Fix dependencies from the VideoLabelMaker
- Version 7.1.0.11 Date 2013-10-31 11:36:13
Better video file support
- Version 7.1.0.10 Date 2013-10-31 11:14:34
Compatibility fixes for version 1.4.0.0
- Version 7.1.0.9 Date 2013-09-17 17:56:16
New shortcuts (asked by sibah). See in the doc page for a ready-to-print document.
- Version 7.1.0.8 Date 2013-09-04 11:31:20
end of debugging
- Version 7.1.0.7 Date 2013-09-04 11:26:38
- debugging
- Version 7.1.0.6 Date 2013-09-04 11:19:29
- Debug info added for video decompression
- Version 7.1.0.5 Date 2013-07-05 16:20:42
- Add support for vision graph export
- Version 7.1.0.4 Date 2013-07-03 15:39:54
- Now tracks white mice
- Version 7.1.0.3 Date 2013-05-23 10:58:50
The read position from line ROI button is now disabled while tracking. This button should be used only while tracking is stopped
- Version 7.1.0.2 Date 2013-01-31 16:53:04
Fix a problem to access video files
- Version 7.1.0.1 Date 2013-01-31 14:05:14
very minor fix
- Version 7.1.0.0 Date 2012-11-07 14:51:19
Fix : If big scales are used, such as 1.3, the models blew out ! This is now fixed.
- Version 7.0.1.2 Date 2012-07-06 13:21:28
Fixed a minor error on display
- Version 7.0.1.1 Date 2012-06-26 14:58:46
- The speed of the tracking can be too fast for human supervision :) so I added a 'slow down tracking to 15fps' option.
- Version 7.0.1.0 Date 2012-05-21 11:50:43
removed debug log. Fix an error if the user close the sequence while tracking.
- Version 7.0.0.0 Date 2012-05-16 13:37:25
Fix: prevent crash if the user switch to a 3D viewer. Fix: VideoLabelMaker image compilation: fix a bug when no file is found. Fix: The video reader is now based on xuggler. Video can now be read by x64 architecture, Win, Mac and Linux New: Video management improved. Improved display speed of edge and binary maps t-Cursor of sequence can now be used VideoLabelMaker display fixed. + a number of minor updates
- Version 6.1.1.6 Date 2012-03-13 11:56:46
- Version 6.1.1.5 Date 2012-03-13 11:54:41
- Version 6.1.1.4 Date 2012-03-13 11:43:09
- Version 6.1.1.3 Date 2012-03-13 11:25:38
- Version 6.1.1.2 Date 2012-03-13 11:23:27
Fix automatic scale of painters
- Version 0.6.1.1 Date 2012-03-13 11:10:59
Memory ghost position fixed.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-03-05 14:21:09
